title: Claiming the Prince: Part Two
description: “I’ve been back home less than a week and I’ve already been tortured and starved and stalked . . . and nymph-slapped.” Magda is back in the Pixie Lands, forced into the deadly politics of the Raes, even though she’d rather be eating pizza in the human world. And she has a long way to go if she’s going to have a real shot at surviving, let alone winning. Making matters worse, she has a new stalker, one who inspires the worst of conflicting feelings: lust and loathing. But her desire for him proves downright dangerous once he reveals who he is and what he’s after . . . that is, besides her. word count: 21,000This is the second installment in the serial novel Claiming the Prince.
author: Cora Avery
